name: The fly who loved tea
description:
Bath in as many tracup as possible while avoiding being slapped !

Control your fly with the arrows of your keyboard.

Watch out ! You have inertia and the hands are fast !

Use the red arrows to predict the apparition of hands.

Made for Trijam 156 (theme Tea Time) in 5h12 in place of 3h.

Still was super fun !
